title: The Chedi Muscat: Discover Oman in Style with Arabian Gulf Views and Prime Location Near Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque
description: Experience the ultimate in luxury with a stay at The Chedi Muscat - sister property to iconic The Chedi Club, Bali - and one of Oman’s most stunning resorts. Overlooking the Arabian Gulf and close to the main souk and Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque, you’ll be perfectly placed for exploring all this beautiful Middle Eastern city has to offer. Includes daily breakfast, one three-course dinner for two, welcome drink, complimentary mini bar restocked daily and more.

title: Beachfront Kempinski Luxury in the Heart of Muscat
description: Experience the authentic Arabian beauty of Oman with a luxe beachfront stay at Kempinski Hotel Muscat. Newly opened and located in the heart of the city, Kempinski Hotel Muscat will have you within easy walking distance of local restaurants and a short drive from the Mutrah Souq market and majestic Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque. Wake up to a daily buffet breakfast and enjoy one dinner for two, plus two complimentary drinks each, 25% off spa treatments and 15% off food and beverages across the hotel.

title: Beachfront Kempinski Luxury in the Heart of Muscat
description: Experience the authentic Arabian beauty of Oman with a luxe beachfront stay at Kempinski Hotel Muscat. Newly opened and located in the heart of the city, Kempinski Hotel Muscat will have you within easy walking distance of local restaurants and a short drive from the Mutrah Souq market and majestic Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque. Wake up to a daily buffet breakfast and enjoy one dinner for two, plus two complimentary drinks each, 25% off spa treatments and 15% off food and beverages across the hotel.

vendor_name: Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa
title: Oman: Arabian Seaside Opulence at the Shangri-La
description: If you’ve been to Dubai or Abu Dhabi and are looking for a more traditional Middle Eastern experience, visit Muscat, the stunning seaside capital of Oman - only an hour flight from Dubai, Abu Dhabi or Doha. The definition of diversity, Oman merges authentic Arabian culture with raw beauty in a way you must experience to believe. Discover the true Arabia with a five-star escape at Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa, perched on a 600-metre private beach and enjoy an elevated three or five-night stay with daily buffet breakfast, elegant nightly dining experiences, a welcome drink of our choice, late 2pm checkout and discounts on food, beverage and spa treatments.
location_description: Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa

title: Five-Star Muscat City Break near Qurum Beach with Six Onsite Restaurants
description: Discover the treasures of Oman with an escape to the five-star InterContinental Muscat, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned on the shores of the shimmering Gulf of Oman. Spend the day soaking in the culture of the city: explore one of the largest mosques in the Middle East, stroll through authentic local souks, or spend lazy days lounging at Qurum Beach. Then, return to your opulent accommodation and visit one of the seven onsite eateries or take a refreshing dip in the glistening outdoor pool.
offer_address: Al Kharjiya Street Al Shati Area, 114, Oman

title: Muscat Kempinski Beachfront Bliss with 11 World-Class Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience regal opulence, authentic Arabian cuisine and renowned hospitality at the five-star Kempinski Hotel Muscat, set within the waterfront district of Al Mouj on the shores of the Gulf of Oman. Each of the exceptionally comfortable rooms and suites boasts luxe, Arabian-inspired interiors, while the resort is superbly set on the glittering coastline. Go beyond the ornate lobby and discover the luxurious  Kempinski The Spa, as well as 11 mouthwatering eateries including The Kitchen, an all-day dining experience; Café One where you can savour fresh pastries, and fan-favourites Bukhara and the Pool Bar. Guests can also enjoy further luxurious amenities and privileges including a secluded private beach, two swimming pools, a kids club, a tennis court, and a state-of-the-art health club.

title: Muscat Stay with World-Class Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience modern sustainability, authentic Arabian cuisine and renowned hospitality at the Crowne Plaza Muscat OCEC, an IHG Hotel,set within the brand-new Madinat Al Irfan district in the Omani capital of Muscat. Each of the exceptionally comfortable rooms and suites boasts luxe, Arabian-inspired interiors, while the resort's mouthwatering eateries, infinity pool, spa and state-of-the-art health club ensure complete comfort.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Muscat OCEC, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Al Jamah Al Akbar Street, Muscat, Oman

title: Muscat Luxury Overlooking the Shatti Al-Qurum Beachfront with Five Onsite Eateries & Traditional Spa
description: Experience the epitome of Omani elegance at the Mandarin Oriental, Muscat, a beacon of luxury overlooking the sparkling shores of Shatti Al-Qurum. This opulent hotel invites you to indulge in culinary delights at the five world-class dining venues, each offering a unique gastronomic journey from the Italian flavours of Essenza to the seaside atmosphere of Sì Breeze. When you’re not exploring the glittering city, unwind with ease in the opulent spa with a traditional hammam ritual.
offer_address: 2827 Way, Shatti Al Qurum, Muscat, Oman

vendor_name: Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa
title: Muscat Five-Star Shangri-La Resort on the Shores of the Gulf of Oman
description:
Experience the luxury haven of Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah, Muscat, a resort designed with inspiration from Oman’s rich heritage and natural landscape and ranked in the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

Set against a backdrop of the Al Hajar Mountains, cradled by a myriad of crags and coves on the shores of the Gulf of Oman, this indulgent oasis offers outstanding facilities including opulent Moorish and Omanian-style interiors, gold-tiled fountains, a central palm-filled courtyard, and private beach. There are also nine restaurants, five bars, a private beach bar, luxurious treatments at the spa, and more than 1,700 kilometres of coastline for guests to discover.

title: Five-Star Muscat Shangri-La Resort on the Shores of the Gulf of Oman
description:
Experience dramatic natural vistas, regal opulence, and authentic Arabian hospitality with a stay at the five-star Shangri-La Al Husn, set in a magnificent castle on the shores of the Gulf of Oman. Rated in the Top 25 Hotels for Romance in the Middle East on Tripadvisor, each of the 180 rooms and suites has décor inspired by Arabian palaces and the resort is also home to the largest entry-level rooms in Muscat.

Go beyond the ornate lobby and discover the stunning central courtyard and the luxurious Luban Spa, as well as mouthwatering eateries including Aangan by Rohit Ghai, serving celebrated contemporary Indian cuisine; Sultanah where you can savour Mediterranean delicacies, and fan-favourites Mahhara Beach Bar and Al Muheet pool bar. Guests can also enjoy signing privileges at a variety of dining venues across adjacent sister property, Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah. Further luxurious amenities and privileges include a secluded private beach, a clifftop infinity pool, and state-of-the-art fitness centre.

title: Muscat Award-Winning Five-Star Beachfront Oasis with Daily Breakfast
description:
Indulge in five-star Middle Eastern magic with an escape to The Chedi Muscat, a stylishly serene sanctuary rated among the top 1% worldwide on Tripadvisor. Perched on an exclusive and private stretch of sand, with the Gulf of Oman on one side and the beautiful Al-Hajar Mountains on the other, this luxury lodging couldn’t be better positioned to explore all Oman's thriving capital has to offer. Discover Muscat's top sights with ease, including Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque, Al Alam Palace, the Royal Opera House and Bait Al Zubair Museum.

Asian-influenced minimalism combines with Omani architecture across the common areas, rooms and suites at The Chedi Muscat, with a lantern-lined reception, extensive water gardens and lavish furnishings dotted throughout. Take your pick of pools to laze by - the palm-fringed Long Pool lives up to its name, with 103m of water lined with black daybeds, while the infinity Chedi Pool sits on the beachfront, offering front-row seats to the stunning views beyond. On the hottest of Omani days, retire to the shaded Serai Pool to beat the heat. Retreat to the 13-suite Spa at The Chedi Muscat (the largest spa in the city) for rejuvenating facials and therapeutic massages, or sweat it all out in the 700sqm Health Club. Work your way around world cuisine at the six restaurants onsite, three of which are perfectly positioned poolside. Graze on Mediterranean fare at the Chedi Pool, sample Asian flavours at the Serai or feast on Japanese and Malaysian fusion at the Long Pool. Taste fine-dining flavours from all over the world in the dramatic chandelier-lit restaurant, or head to the beachfront for a seafood feast. Alternatively, dine under the desert stars at the seasonal Arabian Courtyard, indulging in a buffet of classic Middle Eastern favourites.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages/nights only)**

- Graze on a **daily buffet breakfast** at The Restaurant
- Enjoy a **three-course set menu dinner for two** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Relax with a **60-minute Balinese-style spa treatment per person** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- **Upgrade to the next room category**, subject to availability (excludes Chedi Club Suite; for stays of 5+ nights)

**Club Upgrades**: Upgrade to a Deluxe Club Room, Deluxe Club Terrace Room or Chedi Club Suite and enjoy Club Lounge access and benefits. From roundtrip limousine airport transfers to all-day refreshments, daily afternoon tea and nightly cocktails and canapés in the lounge, this is next-level indulgence.

**Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top 25 Hotels for Romance - Middle East

title: Oman Luxurious Muscat Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Wellness Spa
description:
Discover Muscat from the comfort of this five-star oasis in the Ghala Heights Complex - just minutes from the iconic Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque. This Mövenpick sanctuary offers a rich culinary scene, from Butcher House, a modern take on the classic steakhouse, to The Watchtower, serving creative cocktails paired with DJ beats.

After a day of exploring the capital, unwind in the rooftop infinity pool or with a personalised treatment at NOVE Spa, complete with a tranquil salt room and detoxifying sauna. Whether enjoying date-inspired pastries at Dates & Co, or staying active in the fitness centre with skyline vistas, this hotel blends luxury, pure comfort and serenity in historic Oman.
location_description: Mövenpick Hotel and Apartments Ghala Muscat
offer_address: Al Maaridh Street, Ghala Heights Complex, Adjacent to Sultan Qaboos St, Muscat 111, Oman

title: Oman Beachfront Luxury with an Ocean-Facing Infinity Pool
description: Let the beach magic of Oman sweep you off your feet at Crowne Plaza Muscat, an IHG Hotel, a slice of oceanfront bliss perched on the clifftop of Qurum Heights. Drink in the beauty of the surrounding landscape from the panoramic terraces, watch the sunset from the infinity swimming pool and laze on the private beach. Gourmands are spoilt for choice with an array of dining options from Persian to an international buffet and Italian cuisine, all set on the terrace overlooking the ocean.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Muscat, an IHG Hotel
